Headline: #49 Western,#X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute near Western/35th
ShortDescription: 49 Western, X49 Western Express buses temp. rerouted NB: Wester., Archer and Western Blvd. SB 31st, California, Archer and Western: near Western/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western,#X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/35th, due to street blockage near Western/35th.

Northbound buses will operate via Western, Archer,and Western Boulevard including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, 31st, California and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near Western/35th
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 36th, California and Archer; WB Archer,Pershong, California and 36th: due to, street blockage near Western/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/35th due to Western/35th near Western/35th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 36th, California and Archer including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via Archer, Pershing, California and 36th.

Allow extra travel time.
